creator: speakap
descriptionHtml:
Shoebaloo - The social platform for your organization: for employees and external partners

Shoebaloo is the platform for communication within and outside your organization. It consists of timelines, news feeds and chat features similar to your private social media. All to provide you with a pleasant and familiar way of communicating with colleagues and partners.

Share new knowledge, ideas and internal achievements quickly and easily with the rest of your team, department or organization. Enrich messages with pictures, videos and emoticons. Simply keep track of new posts from your colleagues, organization and partners.

Push-notifications will make you notice new coverage immediately. Especially convenient if you do not work behind a desk.

The benefits of Shoebaloo:

- Communicate wherever you are
- Information, documents and knowledge anytime, anywhere
- Share ideas, have discussions and share achievements
- No business email needed
- Learn from the knowledge and ideas within and outside your organization
- Save time, by reducing e-mail and quickly finding what you're looking for
- All shared messages are secured
- Important news will never be overlooked

Security & Management

Shoebaloo is 100% European and fully compliant with European privacy directives. A highly secure and climate-neutral European data center hosts our data. The data center uses the latest technologies in the field of security. However, should anything go wrong, there is a 24-hour standby engineer to solve any problems.

Feature list:

- Timeline
- Video
- Groups
- Messages
- News
- Events
- Locking and unlocking posts
- Who has read my post?
- Sharing files
- Integrations
- Notifications
descriptionShort: The social platform for your organization: for employees and external partners

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: This incremental update contains several improvements to user interface and stability of the app.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
This update contains several improvements to the user interface and stability of the app.
We have also changed the way we handle Serbian and Montenegrin languages.
Check the About section in the app to see what else has changed!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
This update brings a complete redesign of the app's navigation!

- Made it possible to duplicate a task and make changes to it
- Improved responsiveness when deleting a task from the TaskList
- Improved the Task menu design

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:

- Updated the colors of some buttons to make them more meaningful
- Improved the appearance of bottom sheet menus

Improvements in the Task Management premium feature:
- Auto scroll to top when sorting or filtering changes
- Improved UI and animations related to lists in tags
- Improved the layout in task creation screen
- Added badge counter in filters for selected tags

Most new features are announced in the app itself. Go to the About section to check them!
